https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/5WlAA62MaLzdjCzMzIbZpc1pAN2.jpg A young Vienna-based taxi driver of Turkish origin witnesses an extremely brutal murder. The perpetrator, a serial killer, makes eye contact with her; a deadly game of cat-and-mouse ensues. Cold Hell
